name: S.H.R.E.D
description:
This was my entry for 1 game a month for the April of 2016

Our ship is under attack! The enemy is deploying remote drones to attack our critical weapon and defense systems. if these systems fail, we will be dead in the water.

The Captain has ordered our last remaining Spacecraft Hull Repair & Engagement Drone (SHRED) out to defend our critical systems from attack.

Controls - WASD
Spacebar to fire

Select Repair beam with 1
Select Blasters with 2

There is a rare, but game breaking bug currently, where sometimes the player will tumble off into space endlessly. Looking into solutions now.
